Key Match Events: Phil Salt hit the fastest over by a West Indian in a T20 World Cup, hitting 30 runs with three fours and three sixes.
Adil Rashid took the wicket of Andre Russell, marking a significant moment in the match.
Jonny Bairstow hit a 76-metre six off Akeal Hosein.
Post-Match Reflections: Phil Salt explained that he had to step up after Jos Buttler's dismissal, saying, 'For Jonny to come out and take the pressure off me by taking calculated risks. I couldn't be happier about that as a teammate.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies set a new unwanted record of 51 dot balls in a T20 World Cup match when posting a score of at least 180.
England ran three more runs in 15 fewer deliveries compared to West Indies.
